subject: Pedal control box
description_text:
Hi there,I have just purchased the Vam pro motors and the x ultra control box.The motors work ok but the pedals aren't showing any signal.My pedals are Simsonn Pro pedals pre April 13th 2024 and the connectors that go into the control box are smaller than the sockets in the box.Do I need theplus x control box instead?


Sent from my Galaxy

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并到工单 7196 中
